doc.field: Series IV: Officers and Staff-Administrative Files
Series IV: Officers and Staff-Administrative Files
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records

This subseries contains a small amount of material from Josephine LeBeau, DC 1707 Executive Director from 1994 to 2002. Previous roles within the Council included Staff Representative and Director of Local 389. LeBeau was also involved with the Coalition of Labor Union Women (CLUW).
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), District Council 1707 Records
